> <OLD - Nightlight>
>
> The autorepair system of Nightlight was very damaged and varely keep her
> alive.

RODIMUS looked down at NIGHTLIGHT, his optics dark and brooding and
then he looked up at SABERBACK anger painted in them clearly.

"If you want your little female repaired then you had better get your
cranial unit out of your hind quarters!" MAGMATRON said as he looked
at DARK RODIMUS, his optics glowing dangerously. It was obviouslthat
he was full of some sort of dark power.

DARK RODIMUS stood up angrilly for a moment but then backed up a step,
as if he were seeing something in MAGMATRON's optics that even he had
not seen before.

SABERBACK nodded as he pointed at the approaching TUSCON and those
that were with him. "They won't reach us yet, but soon. We must be
ready for the final stage."

"Stage of what?" DARK RODIMUS said as he looked away from MAGMATRON to
glance at SABERBACk and then at the severaly weakened OPTIMUS PRIME.
"Him? He is no threat to us!"

With a shake of his head SABERBACK looked at RODIMUS, "Don't worry
about that boy, just get ready to defend yourself!"

> <OLD>
>
> To rise up to an impossible challenge meant having to do something
> extraordinary.  But deeds of extraordinary feats did not have to be larger
> than life.  Hearing past phrases from Master Yoketron , Tucson rides the
> torrent of water as if flying through air, as wings double as fins,
> guiding him masterfully toward the root of the problem.  Saberback.   He
> was the one hindering his progress.  Once again he shifts from dragon to
> warrior and draws his blade while still riding the wave of water like a
> skilled surfer, using the walls of the cavern like a surf board, gaining
> altitude and ground on Saberback.  Yet he makes no attempt to strike him
> directly.  With his sword Tucson guides the water over the blade, in a
> sideways position, guiding a torrent of water in Saberbacks direction, in
> an attempt to throw him off long enough to rescue Optimus Prime.
>
> " A storm can find anyone, no matter how devious they may think they are.
> Now, it's time that a few tables were turned.    LEO!   SURROUND RODIMUS
> AND DETAIN HIM!  BIG CONVOY, I NEED YOU TO SECURE NIGHTLIGHT!
> MAXIMALS, PREDACONS, OPERATION STORM, NOW!"

<NEW>

LEO PRIME and BIG CONVOY, along with the rest of the MAXIMALS quickly
moved down the center of the room as well, allowing TUSCON to take the
lead at the moment.

> <OLD>
>
> VICE GRIP had fallen in over behind CRYOTEK, ready over to assist in a
> flanking position as they came face to face over with MAGMATRON and what
> seemed to be..  OPTIMUS PRIME.
>
> DINOBOT was ahead and over to flank, and while still etnirely confused -
> OPTIMUS was still aboard the ARK, and it was supposed to be impossible to
> clone sparks forged from the MATRIX, he held back over and waited to attack.
>  Let the MAXIMALS weaken themselves first after all, and then charge in!
>
> So now, the duo of PREDACONS watied like stooges over for the orders to
> attack, ready to rush forwards and gut anything in their path!


Meanwhile the other PREDACONS looked at TUSCON and then at CRYOTEK and
SKY SHADOW.

"Who does that Tuscon think he is?" INJECTOR, one of the FUZORS said.
"He doesn't rule here."

"No!" CRYOTEK said. "But I do, and I want Optimus Prime dead! Now Move!"

With that the PREDACONS also took to the air and ran along the ground,
running along with TUSCON but having a very different objective in
mind.

The water flowed down the center of the vast chamber, finding the
original channel it had once possesed. At first it was a walkl of
water, then a break as it filled out and then it was a powerful font
of water that ran swiftly towards its goal.

However before it reached the pillar of fire like energy it bisected,
splitting into two streams and began to flow around it. It had made
contact with a shield, a shield which for the moment protected
MAGMATRON, SABERBACK and DARK RODIMUS as well as other SHARKTICONS
that were spilling out from the cave opening near to their location.

DARK RODIMUS looked up at TUSCON and the others and laughed as he
spoke to SABERBACK and MAGMATRON. "There is no reason to worry, that
bungling idiot TUSCON, he couldn't fight his way out of a paper bag."

At the same time others of MAGMATRON's troops began to appear,
dinosaur like troops of all shapes and numbers. And MAGMATRON himself
looked as if he had grown to nearly twice his size. He was standing
nealy a full 20' tall!

He laughed as well! "You have come to your doom!" His voive echoed
about the vast chamber.

This was not going to be easy at all.

(TAG)

- Preston
